mapper.select: SELECT m.userNum, userId, nickname, userPwd, enabled, tel, created, lastLogin, picture, isAdmin, blicenseNum, blicenseKindNum FROM memberInfo m LEFT OUTER JOIN blicense bl ON m.userNum = bl.userNum WHERE userId = #{userId}
SELECT userNum, userId, nickname, userPwd, enabled, tel, created, lastLogin, picture, isAdmin FROM memberInfo WHERE userId = #{userId}
SELECT IFNULL(COUNT(*),0) FROM memberInfo WHERE userId = #{userId}
SELECT IFNULL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM signinNum WHERE userEmail = #{userEmail}
mapper.update: UPDATE signinNum SET confirmNum = #{numRan} WHERE userEmail = #{userEmail}

INSERT INTO memberInfo(userNum, userId, nickname) VALUES (#{userNum}, #{userId}, #{nickname})
